name: PLONG
description:
PLONG blends classic arcade action with a modern upgrade-focussed loop, each run providing a new combination of abilities and upgrades making every playthrough a unique challenge. As you progress you'll earn valuable upgrades that will help you stay one step ahead of the security forces hunting you down.


  • Coffee Break Arcade Roguelike!
  • Five Unique Abilities and over Twenty Modifiers!
  • Procedurally Generated Stages!
  • Steam Deck compatible!
  • Daily Run mode!
  • Three more paddles than most brick breaking games!



Fly through file systems, finding valuable files that will help you progress between runs and customize your PLONG application.

Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate virus and leave a trail of destruction in your wake? Travel back to 1998 and play PLONG now to find out!
